description: Template for creating extraction rules for court websites
notes: Copy this template and customize for specific court websites

instructions.selectors: CSS selectors are tried first. Use browser DevTools to find the right selector.
instructions.xpath: XPath is tried if selector fails. Useful for complex DOM structures.
instructions.regex: Regex is tried last, searches entire page text. Use capturing groups ().
instructions.transforms: Available: uppercase, lowercase, trim, parseDate, parseNumber
instructions.testing: Test each rule in browser console: document.querySelector('selector').textContent
